Browse Locations

Use this word cloud visualization to browse locations. Word size is determined by frequency and all words link to a corresponding collection search.

American Libraries before 1876

Professor Haynes McMullen compiled a set of punched cards in his decades-long research into American Libraries before 1876. The punched cards have been photographed and their data captured in a data table now being made available at this site.
